stories.headline: DATA ACCESS Obtaining restricted files
stories.summary: The article discusses how journalists can gain access to restricted data for computer-assisted reporting by signing research agreements.

stories.headline: SPOTLIGHT: CAR FOR WARTIME
stories.summary: Highlights key databases and resources for journalists covering war-related stories.

stories.headline: Tracking deportations by country of origin
stories.summary: The article outlines how to use computer-assisted reporting to track and analyze deportations by nationality post 9/11.

stories.headline: Getting a handle on shuttle contractors
stories.summary: Discusses the use of federal contract data to analyze NASA's spending on space shuttle contractors.

stories.headline: The Business of War
stories.summary: Explores the use of mapping in showing global connections in the business of war, including arms trade and resource locations.

stories.headline: Analysis helps uncover college funding scheme
stories.summary: Details a data analysis project exposing how phantom classes at colleges generated millions in unjustified state funding.
